level.heading: Duration of an exploratory committee.
level.text: The duration of an exploratory committee shall not exceed 18 months for any one office. Once a candidate's exploratory committee reaches the maximum duration of 18 months, the candidate shall file a declaration of candidacy and form a principal political campaign committee or terminate the exploratory committee.
